name: Momo Game
description:
Momo —

first-person scary game.

You are Max, who was not afraid of Momo and wanted to call her. Only here, in the afternoon it will not be so scary to call, but at night, and even when parents are not at home - it's really scary cool thought Max ... Night came, Max turned off the light in the whole house and called momo. Nobody answered, Max called many times and eventually fell asleep ... When he woke up, he was very scared. There was neither his bed nor the room. Solid corridors and blood everywhere. Max thought he was still asleep, but it was not a dream ...

The rules of the game are simple:

1) Do not let momo turn off all the lights.
2) Hold for "6" hours.

-Game world

You are in an unknown place for you. Around you walls, blood and someone's crying

-Features

• A real terrible atmosphere
• Excellent optimization
• Good graphics
• Quickly passes
• Low weight
• Powered by Unreal Technology

-Input

[WASD] - Control the Player
[E/RMB] - Interact with Object
[Q] - Quit game
[R] - Restart game
[Pause] - Pause
[F] - Flash.

-System Requirements[PC]

Minimum:
OS: Windows 7, 8, 10 (32 Bits)
Processor: 2.0+ GHz
Memory: 512 MB RAM
Video: NVIDIA GeForce 8800 GTS | AMD Radeon 3850
DirectX: Version 9.0c
Storage: 256 MB available space
Input: Keyboard/Mouse, Gamepad Xbox360

Recommended:
OS: Windows 7, 8, 10 (64 Bits)
Processor: 2.0+ GHz multi-core
Memory: 1 GB RAM
Video: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 650 | AMD Radeon HD 6950
DirectX: Version 9.0c|11
Storage: 512 MB available space
Input: Keyboard/Mouse, Gamepad Xbox360
